title: Powered by People
description: Understanding the motivations, challenges, and strategies of the contributors to Wikimedia Projects.

title: Online Social Behavior
description: Examining the prosocial and disruptive dimensions of online culture - on and off-wiki.

title: Machine Augmentation
description: Exploring machine-in-the-loop technologies to enable knowledge equity at scale.

title: Sentiment & Perception
description: Understanding how our readers and contributors perceive and engage with our tools and processes.

title: Research & Development
description: Exploring longer horizon vision through design-lead experiments and collaborations with third party partners.

title: Numeric Exploration
description: Understanding reader, editor and wiki-specific phenomena through quantitative analysis.
